College of Arts and Science Bulletin
College of Arts and Science Bulletin

The College of Arts and Science Bulletin provides an overview of the policies, requirements, course offerings, schedules, activities, tuition, fees, and calendar of CAS's undergraduate programs. It also includes the program requirements and a sample plan of study for each program and an overview of the college core curriculum and first-year seminar program.
